title: kassadins joke makes no sense
body:
So his joke is "i tried to silence my mother once,boy do i regret that"

This joke no longer makes sense as kassidin no longer has a silence and hasnt had one for many years

My remedy,give kassadin a silence back on his q or ult.

Rito plz fix

replies.body:
Silences are cancer (and actually I play Kassadin)

no assassin should ever have a silence.

But technically his Q does still silence, its just a 0.01 sec silence.
It interupts channels, not really a silence
It is a silence, just a very short one, so all it can do is interrupt channels.
yeah i really wouldn't call it a silence as it only works champs channeling, eg fiddles ult, xeraths q, it doesn't prevent people from using any ability like a silence

If you try to use an ability at the exact moment it hits, the ability doesn't go off, (I've had it happen)

and it will be coded as a silence (just for a very small amount of time) 
so technically, it is a silence.
